text: Jooseph Stanislas François Xavier Alexis Rovère de Fontvielle (born 16 July 1748 in Bonnieux ( Vaucluse ), died 11 September 1798 in Sinnamary, French Guiana, was a general and politician of the French Revolution. Category:1748 births Category:1798 deaths Category:People from Vaucluse Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:French generals
title: Stanislas Joseph François Xavier Rovère
